metadata.description: As an Elysian war rages onward and spills upon the Earth, an ethereal gift, bequeathed to a mortal nonetheless, is all that stands between the dark minions of Hell and their malignant conquest of the Heavens. Suzanne Bancroft is a single nurse at a small Colorado hospital, her life is tight knit, friends are few, and her craving for adventure is all but nonexistent.
metadata.name: Power of the Valkyrie (Arcana)
